description: Applies styling to React components using CSS modules or Tailwind CSS classes.

inputs.name: target_file
inputs.description: Path to the component file to apply styles to.

inputs.name: styles
inputs.description: Object defining styles (CSS rules or Tailwind class strings).

inputs.name: css_file_path
inputs.description: Path to the CSS module file if 'css_module' method is used.

outputs.name: modified_files
outputs.description: List of files that were modified for styling.
